Review_Summary: This is a nice product worthy of the price , does not make the usual grinder noise , only suitable for a very small family , but since ours is a big family we have to use it to grind batter daily , so if your family has more than 4 members , please go for a bigger size.

On dialing to customer care agent, call gets diverted to some other location.A complete defective product. Waste of spending money on the product, if it's not working as expected.
